1.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Chandler is sitting in the living room as Monica
enters.

lines.Line:
Oh my God! You cleaned! (Gasps) Look at these floors! You did the
windows! Oh, I have been begging you for months and you did! You cleaned! And nagging
works
Y’know uh, I didn’t actually do this
Y’know uh, I didn’t actually do this
Oh no, was I cleaning in my sleep again

(shocked) I hope by maid you mean mistress, because if some other woman
was here cleaning then
Uh honey, I know you don’t like to relinquish control
Oh, relinquish is just a fancy word for lose
Oh, relinquish is just a fancy word for lose

Look, she’s really nice. Okay? And she mentioned that she adored
the way that you arranged the sponges

Yes, I distinctly remember ‘cause I thought it was a joke. Now
just give her a chance, okay
Fine, I can do it. (Gets anxious.) Whew
Fine, I can do it. (Gets anxious.) Whew
Well, usually when I’m this anxious, I clean

2.SceneDescription:
Ross’s Building, they are approaching the apartment of the woman who died.
Ross knocks on the door and a woman answers it.

lines.Line: Hi. I’m Ross Geller. I live in the building
And I’m Rachel, an admirer of the building

I-I heard about Mrs. Verhoeven passing away and I’m so sorry for your
loss

It looked like we were gonna lose her this morning,
but she’s a tough old bird

Of course! Uh yeah, she and I would talk all the time in-in (Rachel pokes
her head in and starts to look around) the laundry room. (Pushes Rachel out of the way.

You speak Dutch? (In Dutch) Zeer vereerd een vriend
van mijn moeder te ontmoeten. (Translation: I’m very honored to meet a friend of my
mother.
Y’know I would it’s just painful
Y’know I would it’s just painful
Y’know I would it’s just painful

Hmm. Do you think—Could you tell me if she’s hanging in, in a
one bedroom or a two

3.SceneDescription: Eric’s Apartment, he’s opening the door to reveal Phoebe.

lines.Line: Come in, I’m so glad you’re here
Yeah, me too. Not in the shaky angry way you are though
Sorry, I just saw Ursula. I had to give the engagement ring back

Just seeing her brought it all back. All the lies, the way she used me. I
just…I got so angry just looking at her…(Looks at Phoebe)…face
Yeah. (Covers her face with her hand.) Yeah

I’m sorry. I just…when I look at you I see her. When I see her I
get a little bit angry

No wait! There’s only a problem when I look at you. (Sits down on the
couch.) Oh I got it! I got it. (Puts his hands to his eyes.
No don’t tear out your eyes!
No don’t tear out your eyes!
I was just, I was just gonna take out my lenses
Oh, yeah try that. (He finishes and looks at her.) So, is that better

Not really. You…you’re blurry, but you still look like Ursula.
You’re Blursula. Okay wait. Maybe…If I-if I just don’t look at you for a
while. (Stands up and turns his back to her.) See? It…it works. I’m not,
I’m not angry at all anymore! This is a great date

Look Eric, turn around. (He does so.) Look, I like you, but it
shouldn’t be this hard. Y’know? This is our first date y’know? First
dates are supposed to be about excitement and electricity and ‘Ooh, he just touched
my hand, did he mean to touch my hand?’ and y’know first kisses and…(He
kisses her)…second kisses. (Motions for him to kiss her again which he does and they
start to make out.

4.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Brenda is sweeping and Monica is sitting at the kitchen
table.

lines.Line: Oh thanks! I like your top
Oh. (Holds on to it.) (To herself) You’re not gettin’ it

lines.Character:
(Brenda bends down to use the dustpan and Monica leans over to look for the stain, but
leans so far over she falls out of the chair
lines.Line:
Brenda bends down to use the dustpan and Monica leans over to look for the stain, but
leans so far over she falls out of the chair.
I was thinking about taking my lunch break

Oh, will you do the top of the cabinets? That’ll really work up
your appetite for lunch

lines.Character:
(Brenda pulls a chair to the counter and uses it to get up on the counter in order to
clean the top of the cabinets. Monica sneaks over, bends over, and tries to see the stain.
That doesn’t work so she sticks her head between Brenda’s legs. Suddenly Brenda
changes her stance and traps Monica’s head between her legs
lines.Line:
Brenda pulls a chair to the counter and uses it to get up on the counter in order to
clean the top of the cabinets. Monica sneaks over, bends over, and tries to see the stain.
That doesn’t work so she sticks her head between Brenda’s legs. Suddenly Brenda
changes her stance and traps Monica’s head between her legs.
I’m sorry. I’ve never had a maid before, is this not okay

5.SceneDescription: Eric’s Apartment, he and Phoebe are still making out.

lines.Line: Ooh, oh no! I have to go! I have a massage appointment
Oh no, stay here we’ll keep doing this. I’ll pay you
No, I got in trouble for that before. I’ll see you later

Absolutely. (They kiss and Phoebe heads for the door.) I love the way you
kiss

Really? That’s the thing I’m worse at! You’ll see.
(Exits.

Really? That’s the thing I’m worse at! You’ll see.
(Exits.

6.SceneDescription:
Mrs. Verhoeven’s Apartment, Ross is back to inquire about the elder
Verhoeven’s health or lack there of.

lines.Line:
(happily) Oh. (Realizes then sadly) Oh. Well I uh, I brought her some
bloemen. (Flowers in Dutch.

That’s so sweet. (Takes the flowers.) Would you
like to come in and say good-bye? I’m sure it would mean a lot to her
Oh I don’t know that it would
Oh I don’t know that it would
Oh I don’t know that it would
Well, her memory is pretty much gone
All right then. (Follows her in and checks the place out.

7.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Brenda is wiping the coffee table and Chandler is trying
to look at her bra and leans over on the coffee table to get a good look.

lines.Line: I’m leaning. This is where I lean
Okay. (Goes over and fluffs up the pillows on the couch

Yes! It’s flown into your blouse and you’d better undo your
buttons lest it sting you
I think I know what’s going on here
I think I know what’s going on here

Look, I know it must be hard that your wife is a lesbian, but it’s
wrong. You’re married

I totally understand. (They both laugh.) Can I just see your
bra

8.SceneDescription:
Joey and Rachel's, Rachel enters and notices that Joey has set up a space for
the baby where the couch was, complete with a crib.

lines.Line:
Hey! Uh, this is just to give you an idea. Okay well, we can put screens
here, (In front of the crib.) so that the baby has privacy, and-and-and maybe a mobile
over the crib. And uh—Oh look! Here’s a baby monitor (Holds it up), which until
the baby comes we can use as walkie-talkies. Huh

You’re so sweet. (Notices something in the crib.) Oh my God! And
you gave the baby Hugsy! (A stuffed penguin wearing a ski jacket, goggles, and hat.

Ahhhhhhhhhhhh…. That-that-that’s really just to show where the
baby would go. Y’know why don’t I hold on to him so that there’s no
confusion? (Takes him back, sets him on the chair, and apologizes to him.
But Joey the baby is going to be crying, it’s going to be loud
But Joey the baby is going to be crying, it’s going to be loud
It’s gonna be up all night
What about all the women you want to bring home

Look, if I’m bringing home a woman who can’t stand being around
a baby, then maybe I don’t want to be with that woman! Or maybe we’ll just do it
in the bathroom of the club

Yeah! All right—Look, I know sometimes it’ll be hard, okay? But,
it’ll also be really…really great. Please Rachel! I-I-I really want you to stay
I want me to stay too
I want me to stay too
Thank you. (They hug.) Oh Joey and look at this crib! It’s so cute
I know! I found it on the street
I know! I found it on the street
Are you serious—Really?! It’s in such good condition
Wow! Whoa-whoa what’s under the covers

It’s still—(Screams)—It’s got a tail! Get it out of
here! Get it out of here!
Ooh! Ah! Okay! (Quickly drags the crib outside.
